name: The legend of Zelda (Gameboy)
description:
This is an fan demake of the legend of Zelda made in GB studio.

Controls:

You move with the arrow keys and interact with things with Z.  After getting the sword swing it with X (there are no enemies so it's just for aesthetics). Bring up the map with ENTER and also use it for START. See how many rupees you have with SHIFT.
